metadata.title: CVE-2024-38476 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Vulnerability in core of Apache HTTP Server 2.4.59 and earlier arevulnerably to information disclosure, SSRF or local script executionviaÂ backend applications whose response headers are malicious orexploitable.Users are recommended to upgrade to version 2.4.60, which fixes this issue.

criterions.comment: apache2 package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
